name: UldreVoid
description:
UldreVoid is an action game with RPG elements created by a solo South African developer.

Explore the Kaldavsil Valleys and fight a legion of soldiers and monsters using various combat abilities while using powerful Void elements to upgrade your skills.

Set out alone in a chaotic world to discover what lies in the Void, a monumental orb-like energy growth that changes the world around it. Use your host of abilities and discover dark truths on the way while battling monsters and empires controlled by greed. Expand your skillset through practice and experience on the battle-field.
